channel.title: OnyxScape (now working on client)
channel.description:
[b]Server: On hold.[/b] *please note that the pictures below are not my client.
Well hello, this is my first source i have ever made so bear with me. This is not a server where you get 500m in about 2 minutes... Our items have value here...and so do our skills... I have a lot to do...I'm thinking of making xp rate around 200. So far i got A decent starter of about all iron armor and a wc axe and pic. I got a good Lumby npc with all cows, goblins, man/women, big rats and little ones, ghost in the grave yard and so on. __________ [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/NewBitmapImage.jpg[/img] What I would like to add... A pking area similar to a pk box but is more RuneScape realistic. With all my nooby emote teles all the areas around there will have a full npc respond. Hopefully for working pc. NO shops that sell dragon/ Bandos items they will only get from drops. Barrows with a smaller chance of getting an item... Some cool quest. Castle wars. And suggestions taking in by you. (This is a 317 source) __________ Pictures (sorry some are bad quality)
Edge pking [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/1v1.jpg[/img]
Death respond, bad timing of pic. but there ghost around there also :) [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/ScreenHunter_02Dec242207.gif[/img]
Lumby npcs all move [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/ScreenHunter_03Dec242210.gif[/img]
Lumby bank [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/ScreenHunter_05Dec242213.gif[/img]
General store he moves also but not to hard to do so. [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/general.jpg[/img]
My starter [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/starter.jpg[/img]
Tazar fight pits and its bank [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/taz.jpg[/img]
Credits: Adampl40 78% Me 22% because I changed ALOT TO it.
When I say 22% credits to me that means I'm 22% done. I'd love to here from you! Tell me what you think or if you any suggestions I'll be glad to here!
PS. This is my first source.
let's take 2009 for the better! D_T_55
_______________________________________________________________________________________ [b]CLIENT[/b] * please note that the client pictures below are mine Now this is my client i am working on. I am trying my best to make these spirits look EXTREMELY good. [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/onyxscapeclient.jpg[/img]
Client: 25%
[IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/34809strip.gif[/img]

item.title: OnyxScape (now working on client)
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Dashing through the snow
In a one horse open sleigh
O’er the fields we go
Laughing all the way
Bells on bob tails ring
Making spirits bright
What fun it is to laugh and sing
A sleighing song tonight

Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh
Jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh

A day or two ago
I thought I’d take a ride
And soon Miss Fanny Bright
Was seated by my side
The horse was lean and lank
Misfortune seemed his lot
We got into a drifted bank
And then we got upsot

Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh
Jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh yeah

Jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh
Jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride
In a one horse open sleigh

Server looks good. Have fun with XMAS

Read full topic

item.title: OnyxScape (now working on client)
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

Server: On hold.
*please note that the pictures below are not my client.

Well hello, this is my first source i have ever made so bear with me.
This is not a server where you get 500m in about 2 minutes… Our items have value here…and so do our skills…
I have a lot to do…I’m thinking of making xp rate around 200. So far i got A decent starter of about all iron armor and a wc axe and pic. I got a good Lumby npc with all cows, goblins, man/women, big rats and little ones, ghost in the grave yard and so on.

NewBitmapImage.jpg1024×768

What I would like to add…
A pking area similar to a pk box but is more RuneScape realistic.
With all my nooby emote teles all the areas around there will have a full npc respond.
Hopefully for working pc.
NO shops that sell dragon/ Bandos items they will only get from drops.
Barrows with a smaller chance of getting an item…
Some cool quest.
Castle wars.
And suggestions taking in by you.
(This is a 317 source)

Pictures (sorry some are bad quality)

Edge pking

Death respond, bad timing of pic. but there ghost around there also

Lumby npcs all move

Lumby bank

General store he moves also but not to hard to do so.

My starter

Tazar fight pits and its bank

Credits: Adampl40 78%
Me 22% because I changed ALOT TO it.

When I say 22% credits to me that means I’m 22% done.
I’d love to here from you!
Tell me what you think or if you any suggestions I’ll be glad to here!

PS. This is my first source.

let’s take 2009 for the better!
D_T_55
